title: Preprints & working papers
text:
Bhattacharya, Sohom, Jianqing Fan, and Debarghya Mukherjee. 2024. “Deep Neural Networks for Nonparametric Interaction Models with Diverging Dimension.” The Annals of Statistics 52 (6): 2738–66.


Bo, Shi, AmirEmad Ghassami, and Debarghya Mukherjee. 2024. “A Debiased Estimator for the Mediation Functional in Ultra-High-Dimensional Setting in the Presence of Interaction Effects.” arXiv Preprint arXiv:2412.08827.


Chen, Jiachen, Danyang Huang, Liyuan Wang, Kathryn L Lunetta, Debarghya Mukherjee, and Huimin Cheng. 2024. “Transfer Learning Under High-Dimensional Graph Convolutional Regression Model for Node Classification.” arXiv Preprint arXiv:2405.16672.


Dai, Dehao, Jianqing Fan, Yihong Gu, and Debarghya Mukherjee. 2025. “CINDES: Classification Induced Neural Density Estimator and Simulator.” arXiv Preprint arXiv:2510.00367.


Deb, Nabarun, and Debarghya Mukherjee. 2024. “Trade-Off Between Dependence and Complexity for Nonparametric Learning–an Empirical Process Approach.” arXiv Preprint arXiv:2401.08978.


Durot, Cecile, and Debarghya Mukherjee. 2024. “Minimax Optimal Rates of Convergence in the Shuffled Regression, Unlinked Regression, and Deconvolution Under Vanishing Noise.” arXiv Preprint arXiv:2404.09306.


Eftekhari, Hamid, Debarghya Mukherjee, Moulinath Banerjee, and Ya’acov Ritov. 2020. “Markovian and Non-Markovian Processes with Active Decision Making Strategies for Addressing the COVID-19 Pandemic.” arXiv Preprint arXiv:2008.00375.


Fan, Jianqing, Jiawei Ge, and Debarghya Mukherjee. 2023. “Utopia: Universally Trainable Optimal Prediction Intervals Aggregation.” arXiv Preprint arXiv:2306.16549.


Ge, Jiawei, Debarghya Mukherjee, and Jianqing Fan. 2024. “Optimal Aggregation of Prediction Intervals Under Unsupervised Domain Shift.” Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems 37: 73605–37.


Ghassami, Himani Yadav Shi Bo AmirEmad, and Debarghya Mukherjee. n.d. “ULTRA-HIGH-DIMENSIONAL MEDIATION ANALYSIS OF DEPRESSION’s EFFECT ON ALZHEIMER’s DISEASE VIA LATENT FACTOR MODELS WITH INTERACTIONS.”


Hu, Jiaming, Debarghya Mukherjee, and Ioannis Ch Paschalidis. 2025. “DRO-Augment Framework: Robustness by Synergizing Wasserstein Distributionally Robust Optimization and Data Augmentation.” arXiv Preprint arXiv:2506.17874.


Hu, Jiaming, Haoyu Wang, Debarghya Mukherjee, and Ioannis Ch Paschalidis. 2025. “CCFC: Core & Core-Full-Core Dual-Track Defense for LLM Jailbreak Protection.” arXiv Preprint arXiv:2508.14128.


Maity, Subha, Debarghya Mukherjee, Moulinath Banerjee, and Yuekai Sun. 2022. “Predictor-Corrector Algorithms for Stochastic Optimization Under Gradual Distribution Shift.” arXiv Preprint arXiv:2205.13575.


Maity, Subha, Debarghya Mukherjee, Mikhail Yurochkin, and Yuekai Sun. 2021. “Does Enforcing Fairness Mitigate Biases Caused by Subpopulation Shift?” Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems 34: 25773–84.


McGrath, Sean, Debarghya Mukherjee, Rajarshi Mukherjee, and Zixiao Jolene Wang. 2025. “Optimal Nuisance Function Tuning for Estimating a Doubly Robust Functional Under Proportional Asymptotics.” arXiv Preprint arXiv:2509.25536.


Mukherjee, Debarghya, Moulinath Banerjee, Debasri Mukherjee, and Ya’acov Ritov. 2023. “Asymptotic Normality of a Change Plane Estimator in Fixed Dimension with Near-Optimal Rate.” Electronic Journal of Statistics 17 (2): 2289–2316.


Mukherjee, Debarghya, Moulinath Banerjee, and Ya’acov Ritov. 2021. “Estimation of a Score-Explained Non-Randomized Treatment Effect in Fixed and High Dimensions.” arXiv Preprint arXiv:2102.11229.


———. 2022. “On Robust Learning in the Canonical Change Point Problem Under Heavy Tailed Errors in Finite and Growing Dimensions.” Electronic Journal of Statistics 16 (1): 1153–252.


Mukherjee, Debarghya, Felix Petersen, Mikhail Yurochkin, and Yuekai Sun. 2022. “Domain Adaptation Meets Individual Fairness. And They Get Along.” Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems 35: 28902–13.


Petersen, Felix, Debarghya Mukherjee, Yuekai Sun, and Mikhail Yurochkin. 2021. “Post-Processing for Individual Fairness.” Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems 34: 25944–55.


Sun, Yi, Debarghya Mukherjee, and Yves Atchade. 2024. “On the Estimation Rate of Bayesian PINN for Inverse Problems.” arXiv Preprint arXiv:2406.14808.


Wang, Yuyao, Yu-Hung Cheng, Debarghya Mukherjee, and Huimin Cheng. 2025. “Transfer Learning on Edge Connecting Probability Estimation Under Graphon Model.” arXiv Preprint arXiv:2510.05527.


Wang, Yuyao, Nabarun Deb, and Debarghya Mukherjee. 2025. “Phase Transition in Nonparametric Minimax Rates for Covariate Shifts on Approximate Manifolds.” arXiv Preprint arXiv:2507.00889.


Wibisono, Kevin Christian, Debarghya Mukherjee, Moulinath Banerjee, and Ya’acov Ritov. 2025. “Estimation and Inference for the Average Treatment Effect in a Score-Explained Heterogeneous Treatment Effect Model.” arXiv Preprint arXiv:2504.17126.
